Babiarz3,
 
well your another jack ass heard from, I hope your done.
 
bruc=
e

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigating Team 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
comFrom: babiarz3@...: Fri, 30 Nov 2007 01:22:49 +0000Subject: [E=
VP-ITC] Re: Just the fact!




Chris was the first and only person testing =
this device for quite sometime, making him the "primary tester". The dictio=
nary defines the word"primary" as being or standing first in a list. You of=
fer that he wasalso the first to understand how it was supposed to be used.=
 Yet, nowas more and more people weigh in with their own opinions you quest=
ionyour initial judgment. The fact is that Chris' opinion of how the boxsho=
uld be used has never changed. He has held steadfast to hisbeliefs. That, m=
y friend, is an honorable trait in this field and afact that should be cons=
idered. Chris has also never claimed this technology to be his own. He hasa=
lways and will always give credit where credit is due. He does thisboth pub=
licly and privately. The use of syntax here on whether we call it Frank's B=
ox, TheTelephone to the Dead, Maxi/Mini Box, or Granola in a can is of noim=
portance. Truly, because Edison's plans were never discovered thereis no wa=
y to know for sure whether or not your plans are exactly whatEdison was wor=
king on. There also seems to be a bit of confusion on the role the"technici=
ans" play in this along with another syntax issue ( could thewords network =
and technician be used interchangeably?). Thetechnicians are not interprete=
rs. They can provide assistance to thosespirits too excited or otherwise un=
able to communicate effectively.And they, the technicians, also serve to as=
sist higher vibrations comethrough (just as your "network"). They can also =
be of benefit whenlower vibrations try to get through. You state you heard =
a voice say "Edison here" and awhile back you hadposted that you did believ=
e it to in fact be Edison himself. Yet nowyou say the "supposed" Edison con=
versation. As for portals... I've made my concerns clear previously known.H=
owever, I have witnessed the box being used in one location only tohave act=
ivity spike in another. I've also heard many other storiesrelated to dark o=
r lower entities. So, perhaps you have had noexperiences yet but, others ha=
ve and they are speaking up. You repeatedly state that Chris is a good guy =
but then you say "if hecan't use it in an honest manner..." What could be m=
ore honest thansomeone sticking to the same beliefs he's held since day one=
? Whatcould be more honorable than stating his fears and providing what hef=
eels is a needed warning? Frank, isn't it possible that you two both bring =
something separate tothis device? You, the technology and science said. Chr=
is, the mediumand spiritual side. Someone posted separately here about Chri=
s' ego. I can say this...having concern for the possible negative fall out =
to unsuspectingpeople is in no way ego ridden. To assume that you know Chri=
s'intentions is full of ego. To claim that he only wants to preventothers f=
rom having a device for selfish reasons, is ego's way oftelling you that yo=
u and everyone else "deserves" to have what we donot fully understand. Ego =
won't let you consider that because "youwant what you want when you want it=
".BTW- when the word "harmony" is referred to here it is not a "feelinginsi=
de" like self esteem or some other warm fuzzy. It is aboutresonance, vibrat=
ions, that which will be matched by like resonanceand vibrations. Harmony. =
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:>> =
> I did, from the begining open this to anyone, and I am not amusedthat one=
 person would take the technogoly, claim it as his own, andattempt to make =
it exclusive to himself. For one person to say he isthe "primary tester" is=
 inaccurate, he was the first that kindaunderstood how it was supposed to b=
e used, or so I thought. I think weleft the "treting phase" some time ago, =
perhaps it's time to returnbarrowed equipment?> > I wasn't quite finished w=
ith that e-mail-- I hit the send button inmy rush to get off to work. > > >=
 > I put out a box use guideline thing a year or two ago stating thatno one=
 has the right to take my equipment and and claim their usesupercedes anyon=
es else's use, or results.> > So, to contiue...> > As a far as "technicians=
" I don't get any of that stuff, but---theydo talk about a network, and con=
nection to our equipment. When I firstmade my "Ghostman" box, last week, it=
 wasn't working well, but a dayor so later, it came to life, and one of the=
 voices said it had beenconnected to "the network". Supposedly there is a s=
imilar connectionmade to computers running EVPmaker. I'm not sure if these =
"network"connections are maintained if equipment is taken out forinvestigat=
ions, or demostrations. Of cousre, I can't say if thesenetworks are a fact.=
 I would think as maker of the box, these etherictechs might want to give m=
e, or others some hints.> > As far as the ghost box, or Frank's box, being =
a "telephone to thedead", I think is very poor analogy, the old style phone=
 system ofEdison's day had operators, plural, not one person that recieved =
allcalls, then interpreted what was being said to other parties. That'smore=
 of a master control schema.The old phone system didn't charge youan arm an=
d a leg to talk to someone in the same room either! Somemight say these "Te=
chnicains" are the operators, but even if anyoneesle could hear these voice=
s, why do you need someone to interpretwhat's being said. I say if not many=
 can hear it, or somethingsimilar, it ain't real! There is a certain kind o=
f conatct, ion thatthat your own mind uses the noise as a sort of psychic p=
rop, you hearthe stuff in your head, it may be accurate and real inforamnti=
ion, butno one else is going to hear it. i think that what all this suppose=
dconverstions wiht Edison maybe. I have in fact heard a voice thatsaid "Edi=
son here" but there was no other real information conveyedthat I could unde=
rstand. > As for portals, demons and evil spirits entering the world throug=
hthese "unauthorized" boxes, I an only say, as the original mker of thebox,=
 I have gotten voices cuzzing, swearing, name calling, and eventhreatening,=
 but nothing that has seemingly "entered" our world. Eventhose "threatening=
 entities", when pressed to bring it, fold up likepaper tigers. These being=
s and spirits already exist all around us,and at a higher level, so they ha=
ve full access to this, a lowerlever. Besides. There is that "network" that=
 seem to allow for bettercontacts, and kinda helps highter being to come th=
rough. > > I made these "boxes"! The idea was not "Edisons Telephone..." Wh=
atI got was an assemblage of my own expereince and knowlegde, puttogether b=
y my own mind as answer to my question of what else could Iuse for spirit c=
omuncation. All technology involved was based on whatI had worked on in the=
 past for radio experimentation. I had in fact,a couple years before my int=
erest in EVP, been experimenting withvoltage tunable radio modules removed =
from car stereos for AM DX,that's listening to distant AM radio stations. I=
 was hoping to findother talk shows similar to Art Bell, and there used to =
be one out ofCincinati(?). The idea of using a random voltage to tune the r=
adio wasafter using EVPmaker, which uses a method of generating random spee=
chbits for the entities to use. It was a small leap to apply the randomtech=
nique to an anolog system. I am not the first to be focusing on aproblem, a=
nd have the mind provide an solution in complete form.Nothing mystical abou=
t it. The fact is, after much work, andexperimenting, the tuning doesn't ha=
ve to be random, a linear tuningworks much better. Yet another fact of the =
box, covienently ignored.> > What really chaps my hide, as maker of the box=
, is to have someone,who knows nothing of electronics, and technology compl=
etely ignoreeverything I say about the box, and presume to tell me how it r=
eallyworks, how it should be used, and what is acceptable from it. This guy=
is so honest, he won't even use his real name, but huff and puff at atanyon=
e that contradicts his use of my equipment. I say, as "a Tester"if you can'=
t use it in an honest manor, bring the stuff back--testingover! Like it or =
not, the public has this technology, you can keeppissing and moaning, tryin=
g to spread fear, or you could choose theway of Light. > > Frank-S> > > > >=
 > > > __________________________________________________________> Share li=
fe as it happens with the new Windows Live.Download todayit's FREE!>http://=
www.windowslive.com/share.html?ocid=3DTXT_TAGLM_Wave2_sharelife_112007>

eep typing, we keep giving. Download Messenger and join the i=92m Initiativ=
e now.
